description: The Twig application creates more concise syntax than normal PHP, which makes the TWIG files more readable. Twig has two types of syntax:
NOTE: The Symfony PHP framework uses Twig as its default template engine.

common_filenames.description: index.html.twig - Indicates the template will be generated in HTML format with the Twig engine.
index.css.twig - Indicates the template will be generated in CSS format with the Twig engine.
